Bring the delicious, premium taste of HERSHEY'S SYMPHONY candy with you on road trips, snack breaks and movie nights
Kosher, extra large, extra creamy milk chocolate, almond and toffee candy wrapped for lasting freshness to the last morsel

Deliver the brilliance of a symphony in extra creamy milk chocolate form to birthday parties, anniversary events, wedding receptions, New Year's bashes and date nights to surprise and delight attendees
Enjoy a luxurious, extra creamy milk chocolate treat filled with crunchy, flavorful almonds and toffee with this HERSHEY'S SYMPHONY Halloween, Christmas, Valentine's Day or Easter candy bar
product_description: In this HERSHEY'S SYMPHONY XL candy bar, crunchy almonds, rich toffee and smooth, extra creamy milk chocolate create the perfect harmony of flavors that you and the entire family are sure to enjoy. Stock up on extra large bars, and you'll always have a decadent treat within reach at home, at the office or on the go. HERSHEY'S SYMPHONY milk chocolate with toffee and almonds is a delicious chocolate candy to enjoy on your own or share with friends and family members on any given day.

name: Endangered Species Natural 48% Cacao Milk Chocolate Bar w/Carmel
short_description: CHOCOLATE: Each bar has only a handful of real, responsibly sourced, health-conscious ingredients—without any artificial sweeteners or additives.
Natural 48% Cacao Milk Chocolate w/Carmel

HIGH QUALITY INGREDIENTS: We believe that to craft premium world-class chocolate, there’s no way around it: you need the best ingredients. Our clean, natural ingredients are selected for their quality and sustainability, with a dedicated team constantly focused on finding the ideal ingredients for maximum taste.

NON-GMO, FAIRTRADE CHOCOLATE - We care about the farmers who grow the cocoa that we use in our products, and we’re dedicated to supporting communities that practice sustainable farming practices. We commit to paying premiums so that you can be sure that our chocolate, made in America, uses fair trade cocoa that can be traced back to Fairtrade farms in West Africa.

WHY WE DO IT: 10% of annual net profits support conservation efforts protecting wildlife and their habitats. With over $1.4 million generated in the past three years alone, each chocolate purchase adds up to big support that helps wildlife thrive.
product_details: Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 5.71 x 2.8 x 0.47 inches; 3 ounces

name: Chocolove Creamy Milk Chocolate Bars | 33% Cocoa | Crafted with Silky Premium Chocolate | Non-GMO, & Gluten-Free, 3.2 oz Bar (12 Pack)
short_description: MILK CHOCOLATE MAGIC: Experience the classic taste of smooth and creamy premium milk chocolate crafted from a blend of Javanese and African cocoa beans. With caramel-like flavors expertly blended into a light cocoa finish, this delightful chocolate treat was made to be craved.

SHARE THE LOVE, SAVOR THE JOY: Chocolove is all about sharing moments of pure chocolate delight. Whether you're savoring our full size chocolate bars in peace and quiet or enjoying our individually wrapped chocolate bites with family and friends, our chocolate is crafted to create joy and bring people closer together.

ETHICALLY SOURCED DELICIOUSNESS: Our commitment to sustainability is as rich as our chocolate. From the cocoa farmer’s hard work to the skilled hands of our Master Chocolatier, we ensure every chocolate bar is made with care and consideration.

FOUNDER OWNED & LED FOR OVER 25 YEARS: Chocolove has been proudly led by our fearless founder and passionate Master Chocolatier for over 25 years. Each batch of chocolate we produce at the foothills of the Rocky Mountains is a testament to our love of chocolate, ensuring a consistently exceptional flavor every time.

EXPLORE ENDLESS CHOCOLATE DELIGHTS: Discover your own sweet sanctuary with Chocolove's assorted chocolate offerings. From decadent dark chocolate bars and indulgent peanut butter cups to organic chocolate and delightful mini chocolate bars, our wide range of chocolate candy offers something special for everyone.
SUMMER SHIPPING: To prevent chocolate from melting, all orders include insulated cold shipping materials and ice packs

short_description: Contains thirty six (36) 1.45-ounce HERSHEY'S Milk Chocolate with Whole Almonds Candy Bars in a bulk box
Bring your candy dish, gift giving and s'mores games to the next level with HERSHEY'S classic milk chocolate and almond candy bars
Kosher and gluten free bulk milk chocolate and almond candy bars wrapped for lasting freshness and on-the-go snacking during any adventure
Kick birthday parties, graduation celebrations, anniversary dates, movie nights and campfires up a notch with classic milk chocolate and almond bars for everyone involved
The creamy HERSHEY'S milk chocolate you know and love with the just-right crunch of crisp, fresh almonds inside for the perfect Christmas, Valentine's Day, Easter and Halloween candy selections
product_description: Product Description There's happy, and then there's HERSHEY'S happy. Made of the delectable, creamy milk chocolate that's been a classic for decades, HERSHEY'S milk chocolate with almond bars make life more delicious whether they're enjoyed alone or shared with loved ones. These full size kosher and gluten free chocolate candy bars are the perfect treat for countless special and everyday occasions. Keep some on hand for guests, and store some in your pantry for convenient snacking when the mood strikes. Show up to movie night with a box of HERSHEY'S bars with almonds to share with attendees and please the whole crowd. From the Manufacturer Hershey's Milk Chocolate Bars with Almonds are more than just candy bars. They're chances to stop and savor life's sweeter side, so stock up, enjoy, and even share, these delicious bars of milk chocolate with roasted almonds.

name: Kinder Bueno Milk Chocolate Bars with Hazelnut Cream, Bulk 20 Pack, Chocolate Candy Bars for Game Day, Football Party Supplies, Snacks for Adults, 4 Per Pack
short_description: DISCOVER THE EXTRAORDINARY: Each box includes 10 packs with 4 chocolate bars in each pack featuring a crispy wafer and creamy hazelnut filling; Kinder Bueno chocolates are individually wrapped snacks that double as office snacks
IRRESISTIBLY BUENO: This crispy wafer filled with hazelnut cream, coated in milk chocolate and is perfect for those looking for sweet treats
HAPPINESS TO BE SHARED: Each of these snack packs includes 2 individually wrapped Kinder Bueno bars chocolate candy, making it perfect for sharing a quick pick-me-up with someone you love
FOR MOMENTS WORTH SAVORING: Kinder Bueno sweet snacks are perfect for coffee breaks, get-togethers, topping favorite desserts, or just a sweet treat
PERFECT ALL YEAR LONG: Perfect for Easter baskets, a Christmas stocking stuffer, back-to-school, a Halloween trick-or-treat, or to gift as Valentine candy
MAKE GAME DAY SWEETER: Say YES Bueno! to Kinder Bueno party snacks and party favors as you gear up for the Big Game and unwrap an irresistibly delicious party candy during football watch parties
product_description: Discover the unique and irresistible taste of Kinder Bueno chocolate bars, featuring smooth milk chocolate, creamy hazelnut filling, and a crispy wafer that delivers sensational flavor in every bite. When hazelnut meets chocolate and crispy meets creamy, creating a unique experience of textures and flavors. Kinder Bueno isn’t just a chocolate bar. It’s an experience. One bite makes a mark. Two—you’re hooked. Intricately layered—chocolate, hazelnut, wafer—yet effortlessly enjoyed. This individually wrapped candy snacks chocolate is also movie theater candy that transforms coffee breaks, study pauses, gatherings at home, or date nights into memorable moments. It slips naturally into wedding favors, baby shower party favors, or thoughtful gifts for teachers, delighting chocolate lovers wherever it appears. Nothing can contain the deliciousness and elevated allure of a Kinder Bueno. Irresistibly one of a kind. Kinder Bueno. Not having a sweet treat during your football watch party is 'No Bueno', unwrap an irresistibly delicious Kinder Bueno during the Big Game and make the moment sweeter. Kinder Bueno is the perfect match for football celebrations and is easy to share with friends during the game. Its crispy, chocolaty layers amplify tailgating fun and gathering energy. Whether you’re taking a coffee break, pausing study time, meeting friends, or settling in for movie night, Kinder Bueno shifts easily to lunch snacks, always ready to satisfy a sweet tooth. These Easter treats for adults are the perfect Easter candy for the season. Holiday parties will love the Christmas treats and Christmas chocolate candy from Kinder Bueno. Christmas candy individually wrapped is perfect for holiday parties and sharing with family. Kinder Bueno will delight any chocolate lover who is interested in snacking and wants to satisfy sweet cravings at home or on the go with holiday candy.
